articles.title: Lawsuit against Tesla reveals harrowing 911 call as driver trapped in burning car
articles.description:
The wrongful death suit claims the Massachusetts driver survived the crash but died from thermal injuries after being unable to escape.

The post Lawsuit against Tesla reveals harrowing 911 call as driver trapped in burning car appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts driver trapped in burning Tesla died from thermal injuries after crash.
Lawsuit claims driver survived initial impact but could not escape vehicle.
Case raises concerns about vehicle safety and emergency response in Boston.

articles.description:

articles.title: How much does Tom Brady’s lack of support for the Patriots in Super Bowl LX bother you?
articles.description:
After two decades and six Super Bowl wins with the Patriots, Brady says he doesn't have a "dog in the fight in this one." What's your take on that?

summary: Tom Brady states he has no allegiance in Super Bowl LX on February 12, 2023.
Brady led the Patriots to six Super Bowl victories during his 20-year career.
Local fans express mixed feelings about Brady's lack of support for the team.

articles.title: Hingham kids revive a lucky tradition on Patriots Way ahead of Super Bowl LX
articles.description:
A group photo under the Patriots Way sign has become a superstition for one Hingham neighborhood — and with the Patriots back in the big game, the kids aren't taking any chances.

The post Hingham kids revive a lucky tradition on Patriots Way ahead of Super Bowl LX appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Hingham kids revive a group photo tradition under the Patriots Way sign.
The tradition resurfaces as the Patriots prepare for Super Bowl LX on February 12.
Local residents hope the superstition boosts the team's chances in the championship.
